embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

replies.body: Thanks again Malcom!  To update, as of last night the[ PBE signup site has gone down until further notice](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed) for upgrades.  It's been having some major issues and hiccups, and we need to get those fixed up before getting things back in up.  Hang tight!

Hey! don't fret. A lot of us have been trying to register for a while now, almost a month for me, and while I'm not sure what the issue is or when it started I can tell you that its being worked on with no current ETA.

http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe

Is where we have been getting linked to, so we can keep an eye on the status. It says 'Last Tuesday' is when the update was posted that signups were down. Best I can tell you is to sit tight and check the server status daily for updates.

Edit: There's also apparently a sticky see here:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Q8vGhigp-442017-pbe-signup-site-issues
